name: Airtable Github JSON Export
description: Export airtable tables to json in Github

AIRTABLE_BASE_ID.description: Airtable base ID, from the API page for your base https://airtable.com/api

GITHUB_FILENAME.description: Filename and path for output file on Github

GITHUB_OWNER.description: Username of the owner of the repo for output file on Github

GITHUB_REPO.description: Name of repo for output file on Github

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Github personal access token from https://github.com/settings/tokens

TABLES.description: Comma separated list of table names to include in the export
